6 GB ?!!? What's wrong with you?? NOTHING should be that big. Maybe i should say, what's wrong with Apple. I have DVD Studio Pro 1.5 and it's a grand total of 12 MB, so this file is *500 times* as big. It can't possibly do 500 times as much--i'm sure it doesn't even do twice as much! V1.5 works great, so i'll just keep using that. Thanks.
could someone just post the templates separately?
works fine on an intel mac. the correct serial is posted by gla and emarkay.

FYI: The Final Cut Studio suite is 50GB total: 4GB for the applications themselves, Final Cut Pro, Color, DVD Studio Pro, Soundtrack Pro, Motion, Cinema Tools, Compressor and Apple Qmaster, then 46GB for the optional/templates content:
9GB for DVD Studio Pro, 7GB for Motion templates, 22GB for audio content,  and 8GB for LiveFonts.  
So 6.94GB, compressed, is absolutely normal for this file.  
Please seed so that more people can have complete files.  Thanks.

I think the 4.1 version works for intel based macs.
At least thats what the apple site seems to say when you look for this software but for some reason it puts you in final cut x page. Maybe they're similar in their HW requirements... or part of a same package...
Still, I can now install version 4, but it quits unexpectedly so i'm getting version 4.1 now and see what's up.

Quoting Drew13 on: https://discussions.apple.com/thread/1872344?start=0&tstart=0

4.1 is Intel version of DVD SP, 4.0.x is not, if you have 4.1.x it will upgrade to the last version in the 4.1.x series. 4.0.x will not upgrade to 4.1.x

I still don't know enough about Macs

For those with the error: "DVD Studio Pro quit unexpectedly" 

Try running software update and seeing if you have the most recent "Pro Applications Update"
This is what fixed it for me.

Just Noting that this is also safe for OSx86 Hackintosh Builds. As i am using one lol. No problems whatsoever. Just make sure to untick any unwanted updates.
